header.name: chaos/preprocessor/control/null.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that expands to a logically null header name.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to a logically null header name.
macro.para: Once the directive name of an #include directive is reached by the preprocessor, some header file must be included. This macro expands to a header file that has no effect on the translation unit (i.e. a header with no contents).
